abstract: The decision to give the 3 p.m. hour to politically opinionated, relatively young people (rather than a traditional news anchor) reaffirms the channel’s shift toward political talk.
snippet: The decision to give the 3 p.m. hour to politically opinionated, relatively young people (rather than a traditional news anchor) reaffirms the channel’s shift toward political talk.
lead_paragraph: MSNBC’s plan for a new 3 p.m. program is illustrative of a cable news trend. It’s an ensemble show with a cast of four fresh-faced political pundits.

headline.main: New MSNBC Show Will Feature a Panel of Political Pundits
